roleset.name: defecate slangily

example.name: with GOL
example.text: If they-1 wanted [*-1] to crap all over the $ they could do it on a whim - no other country on the planet has the ability to do so , let alone devalued their currency to such an extent it makes their exports look ridiculously cheap .

example.name: Both args, and Ouch.
example.text: Jeff was training so hard he crapped a medicine ball.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Member of VNcls breathe-40.1.2-1. Comparison to shit-v.01.
